title: UNHRC Investigation – If LTTE is found guilty….who among the living will be held accountable?
content: This question needs to be asked and answered some time or the other and sooner the better. We are well aware that the LTTE ground leadership is no more including the LTTE leader – V. Prabakaran. However, over the years there have been a host of people living in Sri Lanka, living overseas who have…
